Text:
i'm guessing this is to convert a MS .iso into an all in one iso.

In case people don't know what this is ?

i'm pretty sure if you delete ei.cfg inside the Windows 7 or 8 iso that would make your Pro (for example)
a Pro / Ultimate / etc (all in one) disc image

You are quite right xpmule.

Just simply open the iso in most compression applications and remove ei.cfg. Then you will have all the options.

cool then i heard correct..
i've never done that before but i read some chat about doing that at MDL forums
